pageTitle: Snead State Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {31405=Since I live only five minutes away from the campus, I can only tell you what I have heard about dorm life at Snead State. The dorm life there is nice, but cramped, since 2011 had so many freshmen enrolled (both in and out of state). If you are an in-state student, my suggestion would be to live with your relatives and if you're an out-of-state student, live in the dorms (unless you have relatives living in the state of Alabama as well)., 82558=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Am learning a lot I love my classes and all of my teachers are super nice and make class really exciting. Login to rate or flag the reviews Tara from Altoona, AL 06/05/2011 Reviewer is A past student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 3 of 22 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Great for students who want to transition to a four year university! Tips for prospective students Get involved and go to the events that they have! They can be really fun and are a great way to meet friends! Bang for the buck Snead gives out a good bit of scholarships, therefore when you transfer to your four year university you don't mind spending more money. Even if you don't recieve a scholarship, Snead is very reasonable and is a great school! Did enjoy being here
